fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Slash at someone, dealing a basic attack to them and attempting to take their head
- Throw your head at someone, dealing an astral powerful attack to them (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may only hold one charge of your second ability at any given time
- If you successfully kill a player with your first ability, you will gain a charge of your second ability if you don’t have one
- While you have a charge for your second ability, you have a powerful autovest. If you’re attacked with the autovest, you lose your charge of your second ability

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose you while ending the game with a charge of your second ability
